description: young woman at left and man with beard and moustache wearing a hat, lighting a pipe or cigar, sitting on a bench with their backs to the Seine; two women and one man in middle ground at right seated on another bench
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

ULC and LRC, in pencil: illegible inscriptions; on back, in pencil: [P8 / 74]
markings: LRC, stamped in red: [ALL] (artist\'s red stamp L.141)
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 1997; sold in April for PKOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1997-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepere]; LLC and LRC, in pencil: [Sur la Seine]
title: On the Seine, Evening
